attributes.action: The EHCP System is Failing Our Children.The system is broken and needs to change
attributes.additional_details:
Mental health toll: The stress and emotional trauma of constantly fighting the system is breaking parents — and damaging children’s wellbeing.
	• Legal battles: Thousands of families are forced to take their councils to tribunal just to access their child’s legal rights.
attributes.background:
Delays: Many families wait months — even years beyond the legal 20-week deadline.
	• Unlawful rejections: Councils routinely deny EHCP applications with little justification.
	•	Poor implementation: Even with a plan, children often don’t receive the help they were promised.

rejection.details: You could start a petition which clearly states exactly what action you'd like the UK Parliament or Government to take related to EHCPs.
